page.title: 07 Rural Industry.
page.content: Pearsons Electronics is a small business in Occold. The main tools he uses are soldering irons and wire cutters. Mr Pearson makes printed circuit boards. He has also made a bird scarer which has been on TV. This bird scarer is made of plastic and powered by electronics. Town and Country Printers is a small business run by Mr and Mrs Thompson.Mrs Thompson does the art work and the typing.Mr Thompson works full time he does a lot of printing all over Suffolk.The delivery van comes every Monday sometimes Mr Thompson does printing jobs for Mr Pearson.Mr Hubbard uses wood for his business for he is a carpenter.He uses Oak,Beach,Cherry and Pine.He uses ear phones and things like goggles to protect him from the the noise and dust.He makes tables and
